item.title: I took over 200 photos with the iPhone 16 Pro Max vs iPhone 14 Pro Max — here's the winner
Snag a Shark Navigator Lift-Away upright vacuum for under $100 ahead of Prime Day
item.description: As of Oct. 5, you can get the Shark Navigator Lift-Away XL for just $97 at Walmart. That's a $102 discount.

item.title: Can't wait until Prime Day? Get up to $100 off Shark vacuums and air purifiers during Walmart's Shark Days
item.description: Get up to $100 off Shark vacuums, air purifiers, and more during Walmart's Shark Days sales event.

item.title: Get a powerful charger for just $35 and banish battery worries
item.description: Get the Speedy Mag Wireless Charger, featuring a sleek design and built-in safety features, on sale for just $34.97.

item.title: Explore like a kid again with a handheld LCD microscope on sale for 30% off
item.description: Get a close-up look at the tiny wonders around you with a handheld LCD microscope — great for curious explorers of all ages.

item.title: Get a wireless CarPlay adapter for only $45 and upgrade your ride
item.description: Upgrade your car with wireless Apple CarPlay in seconds using the Ottocast wireless CarPlay adapter for only $44.97 (reg. $89.99) through October 27.

item.title: Microsoft Office software you can own — at a price you won’t believe
item.description: This license to Microsoft Office 2019 gives you all the essential tools for work, study, or home use with a one-time payment. Get it on sale for just $24.97.

item.title: Score an M1 MacBook Air refurb and save a ton of cash
item.description: Get a refurbished MacBook Air with the famed M1 chip — it's powerful, eco-friendly, and easy on the wallet.

item.title: The best Windows laptops: Put these models on your October Prime Day shopping list
item.description: Mashable's hands-on guide to the best Windows laptops includes the Microsoft Surface Laptop 7, the HP OmniBook X 14, and the Lenovo Yoga 9i (Gen 9).

item.title: Amazon Kindle vs. Kindle Paperwhite: Which one is for you?
item.description: Amazon's got a wide range of Kindle e-readers on the market, but is the regular version or the Paperwhite the best to get?

item.title: The 10 best Echo devices for building a smarter home
item.description: We curated the best Amazon Echo devices, from the latest Echo Dot to the most popular Echo Show. Plus, they're all on sale for Prime Big Deal Days.
